localResource.name: Host
localResource.label: Host
localResource.queryString: SELECT distinct o.deleteDate as deleteDate, CASE WHEN o.deleteDate IS NULL THEN o.hostName ELSE (o.hostName || ' (Removed on ' || cast(deleteDate as string) || ')') END as hostNameIc, o.hostId as hostId FROM V23HostConfigurationView as o where o.historyId = (SELECT max(a.historyId) FROM V23HostConfigurationView as a WHERE a.hostId = o.hostId) AND o.clusterId in (SELECT h.clusterId FROM V23ClusterConfigurationView as h WHERE cast(h.datacenterId as string) = $P{P_DataCenter_ID}) AND cast(o.clusterId as string) = CASE WHEN cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as string) = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' then cast(o.clusterId as string) ELSE cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as string) END AND o.hostType = CASE WHEN $P{P_Host_Type} = -1 THEN o.hostType WHEN $P{P_Host_Type} IS NULL THEN o.hostType ELSE $P{P_Host_Type} END order by o.deleteDate DESC
